name: NWProtocolWebSocket.Metadata
desc: A WebSocket message you configure when sending and receiving packets.

items.name: init(opcode: NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode)
items.desc: Initializes a WebSocket message with a specific type code.

items.name: enum NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode
items.desc: Types of messages that you send and receive on a WebSocket connection.

items.name: func setPongHandler(DispatchQueue, handler: ((NWError?) -> Void))
items.desc: Sets a handler on a Ping message to be invoked when the corresponding Pong message is received.

items.name: var closeCode: NWProtocolWebSocket.CloseCode
items.desc: The close code on a WebSocket message.

items.name: enum NWProtocolWebSocket.CloseCode
items.desc: Types of codes used upon closing a WebSocket connection.

items.name: let opcode: NWProtocolWebSocket.Opcode
items.desc: The type code of a WebSocket message.

items.name: var closeCode: NWProtocolWebSocket.CloseCode
items.desc: The close code on a WebSocket message.

items.name: enum NWProtocolWebSocket.CloseCode
items.desc: Types of codes used upon closing a WebSocket connection.

items.name: var selectedSubprotocol: String?
items.desc: The subprotocol selected by the server during the WebSocket handshake.

items.name: var additionalServerHeaders: [(String, String)]?
items.desc: Additional HTTP headers sent by the server during the WebSocket handshake.
